pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Pika (Multithreaded)## IntroductionThis repository uses Pika as a base to create connections to AMQP brokers. Pikadoesn't use threads at all so it fails when using a consumer for long livedtasks. This project builds on top of Pika to enable long lived task executionfor consumers by implementing a threading layer on top of the base Pikaconnections.
